messages: 5e805b4fae3eea020c1ddf755fb7b365 (22:49): can you help me out? i need a rule
5e805b4fae3eea020c1ddf755fb7b365 (22:50): on my br0=192.168.1.1 i want to stop all trafic from ip X.X.X.X to ip 192.168.1.3 <part of lan
5e805b4fae3eea020c1ddf755fb7b365 (22:50): X.X.X.X is external if from eth2 masqueraded
d6527fc06f095e346e2bad4b252ec24f (22:52): dunno I've not been good at nat-ing or blocking forwarded traffice
7d470a1090d276ef41573c2a940df92a (22:54): octan: you should reject it to notify the sending pc
5e805b4fae3eea020c1ddf755fb7b365 (22:54): like ${IPT} -I INPUT i br0 -s x.x.x.x -d 192.168.1.3 -j REJECT ?
7d470a1090d276ef41573c2a940df92a (22:56): you could remove the -i br0 because you want to stop all traffic coming from xx going to 1.3
1b0c989f451793341d6195b61ed5c704 (23:05): if I run "aptitude install" just like that, and it tries to remove some packages, what could that be?
5e805b4fae3eea020c1ddf755fb7b365 (23:06): how do i not block pings :P
d949efae795da71ef603b60b018d191c (23:07): octan: i'm not following you...
d949efae795da71ef603b60b018d191c (23:07): i heard icmp was weak, really weak
d949efae795da71ef603b60b018d191c (23:07): i guess icmp is weak, really weak
d949efae795da71ef603b60b018d191c (23:07): hmmm... bot is a lot of fun.
7d470a1090d276ef41573c2a940df92a (23:09): octan: you should use -A to APPEND it at the end
d6527fc06f095e346e2bad4b252ec24f (23:10): I believe it can be used to... insert into a certain location
d6527fc06f095e346e2bad4b252ec24f (23:10): but otherwise you should not use it
d6527fc06f095e346e2bad4b252ec24f (23:11): anyway yes octan that's the rule
d6527fc06f095e346e2bad4b252ec24f (23:11): I would recommend putting a limit on it though
d6527fc06f095e346e2bad4b252ec24f (23:11): so some can DoS you
d949efae795da71ef603b60b018d191c (23:13): limit is usually used to allow packets
d6527fc06f095e346e2bad4b252ec24f (23:14): read the man page octan under limit
d6527fc06f095e346e2bad4b252ec24f (23:14): because there is more than one way to do this
